40-year-old.context: The patient is a 40-year-old female with a past medical history of repair of deviated septum with complication of a septal perforation.

female.context: The patient is a 40-year-old female with a past medical history of repair of deviated septum with complication of a septal perforation.

repair of deviated septum.context: The patient is a 40-year-old female with a past medical history of repair of deviated septum with complication of a septal perforation.

septal perforation.context: The patient states that her septal perforation bothers her as she feels that she has very dry air through her nose as well as occasional epistaxis.

dry air.context: The patient states that her septal perforation bothers her as she feels that she has very dry air through her nose as well as occasional epistaxis.

epistaxis.context: The patient states that her septal perforation bothers her as she feels that she has very dry air through her nose as well as occasional epistaxis.

stretching like pressure.context: The patient has been using saline nasal wash 2-3 times daily, however, she states that she still has discomfort in her nose with a "stretching" like pressure.

frequent dryness.context: She says her nose is frequently dry and she occasionally has nosebleeds due to the dry nature of her nose.

nosebleeds.context: She says her nose is frequently dry and she occasionally has nosebleeds due to the dry nature of her nose.

slightly deviated right septum.context: The patient has a slightly deviated right septum.

large perforation in the anterior 2/3rd.context: Septum has a large perforation in the anterior 2/3rd of the septum.

well healed.context: Septum has a large perforation in the anterior 2/3rd of the septum. This appears to be well healed.

no crusting in the nose.context: There is no sign of crusting in the nose.

saline nasal wash.context: The patient has been using saline nasal wash 2-3 times daily, however, she states that she still has discomfort in her nose with a "stretching" like pressure.

Bactroban.context: She will apply with the edge of a Q-tip. We will see her back in 3 weeks and if the patient does not feel relieved from the Bactroban as well as saline nasal spray wash, we will consider setting the patient for surgery at that time.

Q-tip.context: She will apply with the edge of a Q-tip.

surgery.context: We will see her back in 3 weeks and if the patient does not feel relieved from the Bactroban as well as saline nasal spray wash, we will consider setting the patient for surgery at that time.
